error_description: Missing delete call in the repository/data access layer
PasswordEncoder created per request rather than as a singleton
PasswordEncoder created per request rather than as a singleton
Calling .get() on findByUsername() causes a NoSuchElementException (HTTP 500) on every login attempt with a non-existent username instead of returning the intended HTTP 401 Unauthorized
Appender and log level are set on ROOT_LOGGER, affecting all components and modules globally
Sets the timezone globally for the entire JVM instead of only for the logger, potentially affecting other modules, libraries, and scheduling operations
The default log file name contains characters valid on Linux but invalid on Windows (e.g., application:errors.log). This prevents installation/running on Windows
Hardcoded Linux-specific log directory. Running this on Windows or another OS will fail or move to an unpredictable location unless manually changed
Missing save call in the repository/data access layer
Incorrect MIME type in controller. The API expects JSON but text/plain is declared. Clients sending JSON may fail
Double encryption of the password using a password encoder
